main.description:
Go on an epicurean journey to Italy while basking in the sun-kissed glow of the island at Forno Osteria. The best Italian Restaurant in Boracay, excite your appetite with plates of pasta and brick-oven pizzas lovingly made from scratch. The chef's prized Josper Oven gives a distinctive smokey flavor to fork-tender steaks and fresh seafood, best paired with the Italian restaurant’s exquisite wine selection and eclectic cocktail menu that are rare to find on the island.

The homemade goodness of Forno Osteria's culinary creations is as delicious as it is evocative — not to be missed when in Discovery Boracay.

 

"The restaurant’s steak, seafood, and other meat dishes are expertly grilled and cooked to perfection, achieving unmatched flavour and texture." - Tatler Asia

"Boracay’s hidden gem" - Inquirer Lifestyle

schedules.title: Contact
schedules.time:
Address: Discovery Boracay, Station 1, Barangay Balabag, Boracay Island, Malay, Aklan, 5608

Phone: +63 36 288 9639, +63 917 627 3780

Email: reservations@db.discovery.com.ph

main.description: Enjoy the best rates and exclusive privileges when you reserve through our official websites. Your unforgettable experience awaits!
main.terms_condition:
Discovery Boracay


Terms and Conditions

  • Offer is applicable to new bookings only
  • Subject to availability at the time of reservation
  • Full prepayment is required at the time of reservation. Prepayment is non refundable but can be modified based on the cancellation policy stated.
  •  Extra person charge is at PHP 3,110++ for regular suites and PHP 3,410++ for Signature Suite, inclusive of daily breakfast and roundtrip land & boat airport transfers.
  • Children 8 years old and above will have an extra person charge of PHP 3,110++ for regular suites inclusive of breakfast and roundtrip airport transfers while children 7 years old and below are free of charge when sharing room with parents/adults with no extra bed requirement.
  • This offer cannot be used in conjunction with other promotions or discount.
  • Senior citizen or PWD discount of 20% off will no longer apply. However, VAT Exemption shall be extended and applied during the event proper. Copy of the Senior / PWD ID should be presented to avail of the VAT Exemption during the event proper. If the Senior / PWD card holder will not be present upon check-in, the VAT will be collected accordingly.

 

 

Discovery Coron


Terms and Conditions

  • A minimum stay of 2 continuous nights is required to avail of this offer
  • Package inclusions are to be utilized during the stay, and are non-transferrable
  • Rates are not valid in conjunction with other offers or applicable to group bookings.
  • Rates and availability are subject to change; blackout dates may apply.
  • Rates are charged per room, per night and may vary by arrival date, room type, and number of guests staying
  • Tours must be booked in advance.
  • Child Policy: Children 8-11 years old and above will have an extra person charge of PHP 2,110++, while guests 12 years old and above will have extra person rate while of PHP 3,110++, inclusive of breakfast and roundtrip airport transfers while children 7 years old and below are free of charge when sharing room with parents/adults with no extra bed requirement.
  • Prepayment is required upon reservation. Cancellations and modifications made within 21 days prior to arrival will be subject to cancellation fees equivalent to full stay.
  • Senior citizen or PWD discount of 20% off will no longer apply. However, VAT Exemption shall be extended and applied during the event proper. Copy of the Senior / PWD ID should be presented to avail of the VAT Exemption during the event proper. If the Senior / PWD card holder will not be present upon check-in, the VAT will be collected accordingly.

 

 

Discovery Samal


Terms and Conditions

  • Amendments or cancellations must be done 7 days prior to arrival.
  • This offer cannot be used in conjunction with any other discounts or promotional offers.
  • Advanced purchase is not applicable.

 

 

Discovery Primea


Terms and Conditions

  • A minimum stay of two (2) consecutive nights is required.
  • Black-out dates apply.
  • This offer is subject to availability.

 

 

Discovery Suites


Terms and Conditions

  • Prior reservations required. Subject to availability, black-out dates, and prevailing
  • government guidelines on travel.
  • Booking and Stay Period: until March 31, 2025.
  • Discount for Two and Three-Bedroom suites are NOT available on Fridays, Saturdays, and
  • will be subject to additional black-out dates.
  • MDE Members will be entitled to an additional 6% discount.
  • Maximum of two (2) children 12 years old and below may stay with their family free of
  • charge using existing bedding. Children’s breakfast will be charged, if availed.
  • Extra person charge is HP  1,850 nett per person per night, inclusive of an extra bed and
  • breakfast (extra person policy still subject to government guidelines).
  • Offer cannot be used in conjunction with other promotions/discounts.
  • Non-commissionable.

 

 

Manami Resort


Terms and Conditions

  • Extra adult charge is PHP 3,100 nett, inclusive of the daily breakfast.
  • Extra child charge is PHP 1,600 nett, inclusive of the daily breakfast.
  • Reservation is non-cancellable and non-refundable but can be rebooked if advised at least 20 days prior to arrival, subject to availability and rate difference if the new stay date is not within the same season.
  • Prepayment is required.
  • Blackout dates apply: New Year, Christmas and Holy Week
  • Promotion is only for direct individual bookings, not applicable for group and travel agency bookings.
  • Not valid for reselling on other websites, travel agents, and online booking centers.

 

 

Chema's By The Sea


Terms and Conditions

  • Rates are inclusive of 10% Service Charge and 12% VAT and .08% Local Taxes
  • Prior reservations required
  • Subject to room availability
  • Full payment is needed 5 to 7 days upon booking to guarantee the reservation via bank transfer
  • Booking is non-refundable, but can be rebooked twice if advised 7 days prior to arrival.
  • Black-out Dates apply.
  • This offer cannot be used in conjunction with other promotions or discounts. Senior citizen or PWD discount of 20% off will no longer apply. However, VAT Exemption shall be extended.

venues.title: Discovery Boracay
venues.description:
Discover the best of Boracay Island at Discovery Boracay. Nestled along the powdery sands of Station 1, our resort offers direct access to world-famous Long Beach. Experience heartfelt Filipino hospitality, exquisite dining, and world-class amenities – your idyllic escape awaits.

Enjoy up to 16% off on room rates, plus exclusive benefits when you book directly with us!

Inclusions:

  • Up to 16% discount on room rates
  • Daily breakfast at Sands Restaurant
  • Roundtrip land and boat transfers from and to Caticlan airport for two persons
  • PHP 800 food credits daily, non-cumulative
  • 18% discount at Bogart’s Bar
  • 18% discount on Terra Spa services
  • 18% discount on Room Service
  • Welcome drink upon arrival
  • Complimentary glass of cocktail for two person per night for Junior Suite and One Bedroom Suite bookings, 4 for Signature Two Bedroom Suite bookings, and 5 for Grand Signature Suite bookings

 

Promo code: BOOKDIRECT

venues.title: Discovery Coron
venues.description:
Discovery Coron, previously known as Club Paradise Palawan, is situated on the untouched Dimakya Island within the protected UNESCO Biosphere Reserve. Acknowledged by global organizations like Green Destinations, it provides pristine beaches, abundant flora and fauna, and cerulean waters. 

Enjoy up to 16% discount on room rates and additional perks when you book directly with us!

Inclusions:

  • Up to 16% discount on room rates
  • Daily breakfast at Firefish Restaurant
  • Roundtrip land and boat transfers from and to Busuanga airport for two persons
  • PHP 800 food credits daily, non-cumulative
  • 16% discount at Dugong Bar
  • 16% discount on Glow Spa services
  • 16% discount on selected tours
  • Welcome drink upon arrival
  • Complimentary glass of cocktail per person per night

 

Promo code: BOOKDIRECT

venues.title: Discovery Samal
venues.description:
Discovery Samal, our 5-star luxury resort in Davao, offers magnificent views of the Davao Gulf. With lavish rooms and villas, it combines refined comfort, convenience, and the genuine culture of care that the Discovery brand is known for. Whether you’re a business traveler or leisure seeker, Discovery Samal promises profound experiences in a scenic landscape.

Enjoy up to 25% Savings on our Best Available Rates when you book your next getaway today!

Inclusions:

  • Daily breakfast for two (2) persons at The Shoreline
  • Complimentary roundtrip airport and boat transfers for two (2) persons
  • Complimentary use of swimming pool and beach area
  • Complimentary WiFi access
  • 10% off on food and beverage outlets
  • 10% off on watersports activities
  • 10% off on Samal Escape Spa treatments
  • Welcome drink upon arrival

venues.title: Discovery Primea
venues.description:
Discovery Primea, located in Metro Manila’s iconic Central Business District, is a distinguished member of the Preferred Hotels & Resorts LVX Collection. With well-appointed rooms and suites, this award-winning luxury hotel in Makati is renowned for its unparalleled and personalized service.

Enjoy up to 20% savings on the Best Available Rate when you book directly with us!

Inclusions:

  • Breakfast for two (2) at Restaurant Tapenade (applicable to Business Flat and Business Suite bookings)
  • High-speed Wi-Fi access for unlimited devices
  • Access to infinity pool and 24-hour gym
  • Restaurant dining credits worth PHP 1,000 nett per stay, redeemable at signature restaurants
  • Complimentary single-car parking

 

Promo code: BOOKSMART

venues.title: Discovery Suites
venues.description:
Discovery Suites, situated in the Ortigas Business District, offers a strategic location where shopping, dining, and entertainment options abound. Conveniently located across from Podium Mall and near other attractions, this all-suite hotel seamlessly combines the convenience of a serviced residence with the perks of modern hotel living ideal for both business trip and staycation.

Enjoy up to 20% OFF on Best Available Rates when you book directly with us!

Inclusions:

  • Breakfast for two (2) persons in a Junior and One-Bedroom Suite, four (4) persons in a Two-Bedroom Suite, and six (6) in a Three-Bedroom Suite.
  • Complimentary late check-out at 4:00PM for Junior and One-Bedroom Suites only (subject to availability).
  • High-speed internet access
  • Access to swimming pool and gym
  • 15% discount on Food and Beverage, redeemable at 22 Prime, Restaurant 5, and room service.

 

Promo code: BOOKSMART

venues.title: Manami Resort
venues.description:
A Signature Collection property, Manami Resort is an exquisite gem nestled within the untouched beauty of Negros Occidental. This tranquil oasis, situated in Sipalay City offers a unique blend of nature immersion, meticulously designed accommodations, and heartfelt service by Discovery. Whether you seek relaxation or adventure, this hidden paradise awaits.

Book directly via our website for best rates and exclusive privileges! 

Accommodation Rate Per Night (nett)
Oceanview Suites PHP 18,000
Poolside Suites PHP 20,500
Deluxe Villa PHP 24,000
Two-Bedroom Villa PHP 28,000


Rates are inclusive of service charge and taxes.


Inclusions:

  • Daily breakfast for two adults at Lingaw Restaurant
  • Hotel credits worth PHP 1,500 per night stay
  • 15% off on Linong Spa services
  • Wireless Internet Access
  • Use of snorkeling gear and aqua shoes
  • Pool and beach access
  • Complimentary spelunking trip  in our in-property cave
    • for two (2) adults for Oceanview Suites, Poolside Suites, and Deluxe Villa 
    • for four (4) adults for Two-Bedroom Villa
  • Daily refreshments at the poolside
  • In-room Linong Head, Neck, and Shoulder Massage


Booking Period: Until November 30, 2025
Stay Period: Until November 30, 2025

Promo Code: BOOKDIRECT

venues.title: Chema's By The Sea
venues.description:
Savor every moment of your island getaway and discover the garden beach resort of your dreams with 15% OFF on our weekend Best Available Rate with breakfast when you book direct. Enjoy cozy accommodations, comforting dining experience, and the your own spot by the beach. 

Offer includes:

  • Daily Breakfast served in-room or at Garden House Restaurant
  • Roundtrip boat transfers from and to Waterfront Insular Hotel Davao
  • Complimentary refreshments upon arrival
  • Complimentary amenities
  • Complimentary WiFi access
  • Complimentary use of the two (2) swimming pools
  • PHP 1,000 food and beverage credits for the entire duration of the stay

offer_items.dining_offer_description: Relish the flavors of premium USDA Top Blade steak, grilled to perfection in a Josper oven.

attributes.value:
Go on an epicurean journey to Italy while basking in the sun-kissed glow of the island at Forno Osteria. The best Italian Restaurant in Boracay, excite your appetite with plates of pasta and brick-oven pizzas lovingly made from scratch. The chef's prized Josper Oven gives a distinctive smokey flavor to fork-tender steaks and fresh seafood, best paired with the Italian restaurant’s exquisite wine selection and eclectic cocktail menu that are rare to find on the island.

The homemade goodness of Forno Osteria's culinary creations is as delicious as it is evocative — not to be missed when in Discovery Boracay.

 

"The restaurant’s steak, seafood, and other meat dishes are expertly grilled and cooked to perfection, achieving unmatched flavour and texture." - Tatler Asia

"Boracay’s hidden gem" - Inquirer Lifestyle
Relish the flavors of premium USDA Top Blade steak, grilled to perfection in a Josper oven.

Address: Discovery Boracay, Station 1, Barangay Balabag, Boracay Island, Malay, Aklan, 5608

Phone: +63 36 288 9639, +63 917 627 3780

Email: reservations@db.discovery.com.ph

main.description: Located on the 16th floor, FLAME is Discovery Primeas Modern European restaurant. The menu combines modern European cuisine with Asian flavors and contemporary culinary techniques, creating dishes that tantalize every taste and texture. Enjoy an exciting new repertoire of exquisite dishes created by Executive Chef Luis Chikiamco.

schedules.title: Contact
schedules.time:
Address: 16/F Discovery Primea, 6749 Ayala Ave, Makati, 1226 Metro Manila, Philippines

Phone: +63 2 7955 8888

Email: primea.restaurants@discovery.com.ph

attributes.value: Located on the 16th floor, FLAME is Discovery Primeas Modern European restaurant. The menu combines modern European cuisine with Asian flavors and contemporary culinary techniques, creating dishes that tantalize every taste and texture. Enjoy an exciting new repertoire of exquisite dishes created by Executive Chef Luis Chikiamco.

Address: 16/F Discovery Primea, 6749 Ayala Ave, Makati, 1226 Metro Manila, Philippines

Phone: +63 2 7955 8888

Email: primea.restaurants@discovery.com.ph

main.description:
Hailed as Metro Manila’s top steakhouse by TripAdvisor, USDA steaks and sumptuous a la carte selections take center stage at 22 Prime amid a stunning view of the city skyline. Located on the 22nd floor, the award-winning restaurant is Discovery Suites’ flagship dining restaurant and is widely recognized as the country’s foremost name in US Prime Angus steaks—named one of the Best Restaurants by Tatler Philippines for years and counting.

Indulge in refined dining options with Executive Chef  Albee Dedal’s culinary creations: a selection of premium cuts with impeccable wine pairings. In this meat lover’s mecca, the dining experience receives a distinctive and unforgettable flair.

 

"Come for mammoth steaks, stay for the panoramic view." - Tatler Asia

"Where perfectly-cooked steaks meet the breath-taking view of the Ortigas Skyline." - WheninManila.com

schedules.title: Operating Hours
schedules.time:
Monday to Sunday
12NN to 2PM
(by reservation)

5PM to 10PM
(available for reservation and walk-ins)
 
Advanced reservation at least one (1) day prior to arrival is encouraged.

schedules.title: Contact
schedules.time:
Address: 22nd Floor, Discovery Suites, 25 ADB Avenue Ortigas Center, Pasig City, 1600

Phone: +63 2 7719 8888

Email: reservations@ds.discovery.com.ph

offer_items.dining_offer_description: Indulge in three (3) hours of limitless USDA ribeye steak, perfect for family gatherings or date nights.

main.description: Discover our curated list of dining selectons, all crafted to offer you a truly indulgent experience.
main.terms_condition:
Discovery Samal

 

Island Dining Access

  • Dining access rate includes scheduled round trip boat transfers from the Davao Welcome Center. Our food and beverage team shall inform you of our available schedules.
  • Kid Policy applies - 1 to 6 years old, free of charge | 7 to 11 years old, 50% off the dining rate
  • Pre-payment reservation required at the Davao Welcome Center or online via payment link.
  • Walk-in guests must secure a reservation in one of our restaurants upon payment.
  • Food and beverage credits must be consumed on the day of the reservation.
  • Restaurant dress codes are strictly implemented.
  • Applicable charges apply for boat transfers outside of the boat schedule of Discovery Samal. 
  • In the event of unforseen weather conditions, out-bound guests will be travelling via land transfers to the Davao Welcome Center.
  • This offer may not be availed in conjunction with other discounts and promotions.

venues.title: Discovery Boracay
venues.description:
Boodle Fight Feast

 

 

Enjoy the rich tradition of a Filipino boodle fight in Boracay—a hearty spread served on banana leaves, best shared and eaten with your hands. Choose from various sets and cuisines, perfect for groups of four or more.

 

Boodle Fight (minimum of 4 persons)

• Classic Filipino

• Modern Filipino

• Greek

• American

• Italian

 

A 24-hour advance reservation is a must.

 

 

Succulent Steaks

 

 

 

Relish the melt-in-your-mouth perfection of Josper-grilled steaks, topped with rich Gorgonzola-roasted garlic butter, accompanied by charred vegetables and our signature sauces.

 

 

Seafood Board

 

 

Delight in the bold, smoky flavors of seafood straight from the grill, accompanied by local dipping sauces and a medley of grilled vegetables. Good for 4 persons.

venues.title: Discovery Coron
venues.description:
It's a feast of flavors in paradise! Enjoy the finest luxuries of our private island, where you can delight in personalized dining experiences, from beachside feasts to intimate candlelit dinners under the stars.  

 

Boodle Fight Feast

 

 

Food is best shared with loved ones, where every bite becomes a celebration of togetherness and joy. Gather around the table with your family and friends, and choose from hearty and savory dish selections from around the world.

 

Boodle Fight (minimum of 4 persons)

• Classic Filipino

• Modern Filipino

• Greek

• American

• Italian

 

Advance reservation is required.

 

 

Seafood Bucket

 

 

Dive into a vibrant medley of crabs, shrimps, mussels, Palawan clams, and tender squid rings, perfectly complemented by sweet corn. Yours for PHP 1,300 nett per person.

venues.title: Discovery Samal
venues.description:
Island Dining Access

 

 

Savor an elevated island dining experience at Discovery Samal. Only 5 minutes from Davao City, treat yourself to stunning views and mouthwatering dishes at your preferred restaurant.

 

Mondays to Thursdays: PHP 1,500 net per person*

Fridays to Sundays: PHP 2,500 net per person*

Breakfast dining is available from Mondays to Thursdays only.

*Consumable voucher, includes scheduled round trip boat transfers from the Davao Welcome Center.

attributes.value: Discover our curated list of dining selectons, all crafted to offer you a truly indulgent experience.

Discovery Samal

 

Island Dining Access

  • Dining access rate includes scheduled round trip boat transfers from the Davao Welcome Center. Our food and beverage team shall inform you of our available schedules.
  • Kid Policy applies - 1 to 6 years old, free of charge | 7 to 11 years old, 50% off the dining rate
  • Pre-payment reservation required at the Davao Welcome Center or online via payment link.
  • Walk-in guests must secure a reservation in one of our restaurants upon payment.
  • Food and beverage credits must be consumed on the day of the reservation.
  • Restaurant dress codes are strictly implemented.
  • Applicable charges apply for boat transfers outside of the boat schedule of Discovery Samal. 
  • In the event of unforseen weather conditions, out-bound guests will be travelling via land transfers to the Davao Welcome Center.
  • This offer may not be availed in conjunction with other discounts and promotions.

Boodle Fight Feast

 

 

Enjoy the rich tradition of a Filipino boodle fight in Boracay—a hearty spread served on banana leaves, best shared and eaten with your hands. Choose from various sets and cuisines, perfect for groups of four or more.

 

Boodle Fight (minimum of 4 persons)

• Classic Filipino

• Modern Filipino

• Greek

• American

• Italian

 

A 24-hour advance reservation is a must.

 

 

Succulent Steaks

 

 

 

Relish the melt-in-your-mouth perfection of Josper-grilled steaks, topped with rich Gorgonzola-roasted garlic butter, accompanied by charred vegetables and our signature sauces.

 

 

Seafood Board

 

 

Delight in the bold, smoky flavors of seafood straight from the grill, accompanied by local dipping sauces and a medley of grilled vegetables. Good for 4 persons.

It's a feast of flavors in paradise! Enjoy the finest luxuries of our private island, where you can delight in personalized dining experiences, from beachside feasts to intimate candlelit dinners under the stars.  

 

Boodle Fight Feast

 

 

Food is best shared with loved ones, where every bite becomes a celebration of togetherness and joy. Gather around the table with your family and friends, and choose from hearty and savory dish selections from around the world.

 

Boodle Fight (minimum of 4 persons)

• Classic Filipino

• Modern Filipino

• Greek

• American

• Italian

 

Advance reservation is required.

 

 

Seafood Bucket

 

 

Dive into a vibrant medley of crabs, shrimps, mussels, Palawan clams, and tender squid rings, perfectly complemented by sweet corn. Yours for PHP 1,300 nett per person.

Hailed as Metro Manila’s top steakhouse by TripAdvisor, USDA steaks and sumptuous a la carte selections take center stage at 22 Prime amid a stunning view of the city skyline. Located on the 22nd floor, the award-winning restaurant is Discovery Suites’ flagship dining restaurant and is widely recognized as the country’s foremost name in US Prime Angus steaks—named one of the Best Restaurants by Tatler Philippines for years and counting.

Indulge in refined dining options with Executive Chef  Albee Dedal’s culinary creations: a selection of premium cuts with impeccable wine pairings. In this meat lover’s mecca, the dining experience receives a distinctive and unforgettable flair.

 

"Come for mammoth steaks, stay for the panoramic view." - Tatler Asia

"Where perfectly-cooked steaks meet the breath-taking view of the Ortigas Skyline." - WheninManila.com

Monday to Sunday
12NN to 2PM
(by reservation)

5PM to 10PM
(available for reservation and walk-ins)
 
Advanced reservation at least one (1) day prior to arrival is encouraged.
Indulge in three (3) hours of limitless USDA ribeye steak, perfect for family gatherings or date nights.

Book an overnight stay in a 1-Bedroom Suite 
and enjoy a private 4-course steak dinner for 2.

Address: 22nd Floor, Discovery Suites, 25 ADB Avenue Ortigas Center, Pasig City, 1600

Phone: +63 2 7719 8888

Email: reservations@ds.discovery.com.ph

main.description:
Showcasing the bold, light and summery flavors of the Mediterranean, Restaurant Tapenade at Discovery Primea is a dining destination like no other. Nestled in the heart of Makati City, this beloved restaurant offers a journey through the Mediterranean with each taste of its authentic paella, transporting diners to the sunlit coasts of Spain. The brick-oven pizza, a standout favorite, is one of the best in the metro.

A culinary gem, Tapenade is known for its Salad Room—offering one of the most luxurious salad experiences in the country. Indulge in a lavish smorgasbord of freshly-harvested greens, exquisite salad dressings, and premium cold cuts and cheese stations. It's a feast for the senses that promises to elevate your dining experience to new heights.

With its inviting ambiance and expertly crafted menu, Restaurant Tapenade stands as a testament to Discovery's culinary excellence. Whether you're enjoying breakfast, lunch or dinner, every moment spent here is an unforgettable gastronomic journey.

 

 

"Tapenade brings the bold and savory flavors of the Mediterranean region with their new menu" - Lifestyle Asia

"Top-Notch Mediterranean Food in Manila" - Mark Wiens, Migrationology.com

"Tapenade is perhaps one of the best things to happen in Makati’s dynamic dining scene." - WheninManila.com

schedules.title: Operating Hours
schedules.time:
Monday to Sunday
6AM to 10PM

Dress Code: Smart Casual

Advanced reservations are recommended.

schedules.title: Contact
schedules.time:
Address: G/F Discovery Primea, 6749 Ayala Ave, Makati, 1226 Metro Manila, Philippines

Phone: +63 2 7955 8888

Email: primea.restaurants@discovery.com.ph

offer_items.dining_offer_description: Enjoy a leisurely stay with luxurious accommodations and one (1) complimentary pizza of your choice.

Mix and match from a selection of craving crisp veggies, savory proteins, zesty dressings, and more.

Available exclusively for dinner.

Monday to Sunday
6AM to 10PM

Dress Code: Smart Casual

Advanced reservations are recommended.
Enjoy a leisurely stay with luxurious accommodations and one (1) complimentary pizza of your choice.

Mix and match from a selection of craving crisp veggies, savory proteins, zesty dressings, and more.

Available exclusively for dinner.

Address: G/F Discovery Primea, 6749 Ayala Ave, Makati, 1226 Metro Manila, Philippines

Phone: +63 2 7955 8888

Email: primea.restaurants@discovery.com.ph
